snippet: Peyton Manning passed for 310 yards, including his 30th touchdown, as Denver defeated Oakland for its eighth straight victory.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Denver Broncos defeat Oakland Raiders, 26-13; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Peyton Manning passed for 310 yards, including his 30th touchdown, as Denver defeated Oakland for its eighth straight victory.

headline.seo: Broncos Romp, Taking Edge in Race for a Bye
headline.main: Broncos Romp, Taking Edge in Race for a Bye
headline.print_headline: Broncos Romp, Taking Edge in Race for a Bye
